intro: Precision marksmanship and calm decision-making are crucial for this rescue mission. Feel the intense tension as you look through the scope and pull the trigger.
description:
Experience the ultimate fusion of realistic sniping and intense action in this gripping FPS! As an elite Marine Corps sniper, you'll face a dangerous rescue mission on the chaotic battlefields of the Gulf War. Break through enemy lines to save a downed Black Hawk helicopter and its crew. Your marksmanship will determine the fate of your comrades.

・Master a sophisticated sniping system that takes distance and ballistics into account.
・Immerse yourself in highly detailed environments with advanced bullet physics and lifelike audio.
・Feel the tension as you line up your shot, hold your breath, and squeeze the trigger.
・Experience realistic bullet flight and impact that puts you in the shoes of a true marksman.
・Scout for the perfect vantage point and strategize your approach.
・Take on a variety of missions in different terrains using a range of tactics.
・Adapt to unique objectives in each mission that require flexible decision-making.
・Go beyond simple sniping ・distract enemies and make crucial strategic decisions.
・Compete against sophisticated AI that reacts to your every move for intense, unpredictable combat.
・Immerse yourself in stunningly realistic graphics and sound design that transport you to the battlefield.

This thrilling FPS offers an unparalleled sniping experience full of suspense. Hone your precision shooting skills as you immerse yourself in high-stakes rescue missions. Will you become a battlefield hero or fade into the shadows of the desert? It's all up to your skill. Immerse yourself in this unprecedented sniper adventure ・rise to the challenge and become the marksman who holds the fate of your team in his hands.

Prologue
In the midst of the fierce fighting of the Gulf War, tragedy struck. During a special Marine Corps operation, a Black Hawk helicopter was shot down by enemy anti-aircraft fire. Surrounded by enemy forces, the crew is now hanging between life and death.
In this critical situation, a Marine Corps sniper is dispatched to assist in the rescue operation. Infiltrating deep behind enemy lines, the sniper must use advanced marksmanship to cover the rescue team as they approach the crash site.
In a race against time, pinpoint accuracy and calm judgment are essential. Can everyone be safely rescued? The key lies in the skill of the sniper in charge.
